sentence.Network_en: In the Avatamsaka realm , the cook , she cooks mindfully.
sentence.Network_cn: 在华藏世界, 厨师专注地烹调.

sentence.Network_en: Contemplation , for the Transcendentalists, was a vehicle for mindfully and thoughtfully experiencing our own divinity.
sentence.Network_cn: 先验主义者认为沉思有助于全身心的悉心体会自我的神性.

sentence.Network_en: Consider the four skills of clear comprehension that are acquired when one practices faithfully and mindfully.
sentence.Network_cn: 当一个人忠实地、用心地练习时,应仔细思考获得[正知]的四种技巧.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Keep on opening new customers mindfully for future business development ., 持续的开发新的客户 , 以配合公司未来业务的增长;
什么意思_英语mindful在线翻译_有道词典... ... mindlessly 不费心思地；愚蠢地 mindfully 谨慎地；注意地 mindfulness 留心，警觉.

list.abs: （2）一心不乱（one-mindfully）一心不乱 　　大多数人以为同时做很多件事情会让自己效率提高，其实并非如此。
